titles.title: Let The Words Of My Mouth Be Thanksgiving

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Let the words of my mouth be thanksgiving
Let the voicing of my heart be praise
Let each thought of my mind be set on you Lord
May my life be a worship on to Thee.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
That Thou might lead me on more fully on Thy highway
Lead me on unto thee
That with each step I take the old man's left behind
And newness of life cometh forth
